actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to provide that no State development agency shall be entitled to receive Federal financial assistance in any form unless it provides satisfactory assurances that it will take no action inconsistent with local zoning laws.

summary.text: Provides that no State development agency shall be entitled to receive Federal financial assistance in any form unless it provides satisfactory assurances that it will take no action inconsistent with local zoning laws. Authorizes the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to prescribe such regulations and impose such conditions as may be necessary to guarantee that State development agencies receiving Federal financial assistance will comply with the requirements of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide that no State development agency shall be entitled to receive Federal financial assistance in any form unless it provides satisfactory assurances that it will take no action inconsistent with local zoning laws.
